result.title: Renewable Energy Prosumers Inspiration Book
result.description: This deliverable is related to task 7.2. The deliverable is a publication meant to be an ‘inspiration book’ illustrating Living Labs with high quality photos and synthesis of the Living Lab co-learning and co-creation experiences. The publication will consist of around 36 pages, and will be made available also in printable format. The deliverable is successful if it provides an overview of the results of the Living Lab interventions, in a simple language and easy-to-understand format, through the ‘Inspiration Book’.
